item.title: CVE-2024-25593|2024-03-15T13:57:45.891Z -- basix -- nex-forms%20%E2%80%93%20ultimate%20form%20builder
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Basix NEX-Forms – Ultimate Form Builder allows Stored XSS.This issue affects NEX-Forms – Ultimate Form Builder: from n/a through 8.5.5.
